msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I should use it as a landmark, when I'm giving directions.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />We didn't plan to meet up by , did we?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think there might just be something about this spot that draws folks to it, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's strangely reassuring to have
around <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />This way, if I'm out walking and get sleepy, I can just crawl into bed!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Funny place to leave .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Watching TV outdoors does sound kinda fun though,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Since I seem to have found <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe I should throw a party here?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />We won't lose track of time with
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />around, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's kind of funny to leave outside.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is someone doing some container gardening, or are they just giving their greenery fresh air?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It takes more self-confidence than I probably have to bathe outside.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Still, I wouldn't mind slipping into
right now.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's nice to know where I can find <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I get a flash of inspiration while I'm walking outside, now I'll have a place where I can write it down!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice of someone to set out <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a nice outdoor resting spot!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Was someone hoping to inspire an outdoor concert by leaving out ? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wouldn't mind hearing you play, , .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Was someone cooking outside with ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes while I'm out on walks, I've thought I smelled something tasty. Maybe this is why!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Funny place to run across <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe this is a good workout spot?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What a great spot to set up <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's thinking at its best!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There's something comforting about . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoever thought of placing
out here is so considerate! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now if we ever need to check our appearance when we're out and about, we can do it right here.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Does it strike you as odd to see
sitting out here without explanation? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If we were in a children's book, it would be a portal to a parallel universe! But it's still worth a try
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The fresh outdoor air seems to suit this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I get it. I, too, appreciate a nice scenic view, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Interesting. Somebody placed here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Does it know it's on land? Does it like it better than the water? I wish there was a way to do an interview.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What a wonderful idea! It's an outdoor !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Seeing it in this light makes it easier to imagine how it actually looked all those years ago.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is an unusual place to display <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh! Maybe it's an installation piece! Hmm. In that case, I wonder what it's supposed to mean, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Isn't it amazing how art like this can make such an impact on the viewer?In a way, this piece is almost a symbol for . Don't you agree, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Huh. This isn't quite what comes to mind when you think about that famous . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But thenwould a real masterpiece like that be on display out here in the first place, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?You don't see those being used in the great outdoors too often.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Though I sure wouldn't mind having one of those around for my next seaside speed-reading sesh. I'm not kidding. Last time I was flipping pages so fast, I nearly broke a sweat, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I hope someone is taking good care of this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It'd be a real shame is someone just left it here and forgot all about it. Why would anyone do that?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wh-what? Why is my picture here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, inside is one thing, but outside? Idon't know where to begin, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is this a play area? It must be, if someone left outside.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But seeing this sort of thing really takes me back to when I was young, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So I was reading a book recently What was the title again? Oh! !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I was surprised when I read the "" tip.Really, who knew that sort of thing had anything to do with the topic, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't it reassuring to see put out here like this?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />All the comforts of home, spread outside our homes, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I can't believe my eyes. !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think we're allowed to use that sort of thing for free, if it's outside?Some folks can be so thoughtful sometimes, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, I feel for whoever gets cold easily enough that they needed .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a good spot to stay for a bit and warm up on a chilly day though. What a good idea, !
